quiz.question: ______ trajectory
quiz.explanation: 轨迹; 弹道, 飞行轨迹. The flight trajectory was carefully calculated. 飞行轨迹被仔细计算。

quiz.question: contradictory _________
quiz.explanation: 矛盾的; 对立的, 矛盾的陈述. The witness made a contradictory statement. 证人做出了矛盾的陈述。

quiz.question: valedictory _______
quiz.explanation: 告别的; 告别演说, 告别演说. The senior gave the valedictory address. 高年级学生发表了告别演说。

quiz.question: perfunctory ___
quiz.explanation: 敷衍的; 例行公事的, 敷衍的点头. He gave a perfunctory nod and left. 他敷衍地点了点头就离开了。

quiz.question: transitory ___
quiz.explanation: 短暂的; 转瞬即逝的, 短暂的快乐. Fame brings only transitory joy. 名声只带来短暂的快乐。

quiz.question: ____ repository
quiz.explanation: 仓库; 贮藏室, 数据存储库. The data repository stores all records. 数据存储库存储所有记录。

quiz.question: expository _______
quiz.explanation: 说明的; 解释的, 说明文写作. Students practice expository writing in class. 学生在课堂上练习说明文写作。

quiz.question: desultory ____________
quiz.explanation: 散漫的; 不连贯的, 散漫的对话. They engaged in desultory conversation. 他们进行了散漫的对话。

quiz.question: inventory ____
quiz.explanation: 清单; 存货, 库存清单. Check the inventory list for supplies. 检查物资库存清单。

quiz.question: peremptory _____
quiz.explanation: 专横的; 断然的, 专横的命令. He issued a peremptory order. 他发出了专横的命令。

quiz.question: circumlocutory ______
quiz.explanation: 迂回的; 婉转的, 迂回的回答. His circumlocutory answer avoided the question. 他迂回的回答回避了问题。

quiz.question: statutory ____
quiz.explanation: 法定的; 依法的, 法定职责. It is their statutory duty to report crimes. 报告犯罪是他们的法定职责。

quiz.question: harry ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 骚扰; 掠夺, 骚扰敌人. The troops will harry the enemy constantly. 军队将不断骚扰敌人。

quiz.question: parry _ ____
quiz.explanation: 挡开; 回避, 挡开一击. The boxer managed to parry a blow. 拳击手设法挡开了一击。

quiz.question: _____ quarry
quiz.explanation: 采石场; 猎物, 采石场. Workers extract marble from the stone quarry. 工人从采石场开采大理石。

quiz.question: _____ ferry
quiz.explanation: 渡船, 河渡船. The river ferry crosses every hour. 河渡船每小时过河一次。

quiz.question: paltry ___
quiz.explanation: 微不足道的; 可怜的, 微不足道的金额. They offered a paltry sum for the work. 他们为这项工作提供了微不足道的金额。

quiz.question: _____ infantry
quiz.explanation: 步兵, 轻步兵. The light infantry advanced quickly. 轻步兵快速前进。

quiz.question: entry ___
quiz.explanation: 入口; 进入, 入场费. Pay the entry fee at the gate. 在门口支付入场费。

quiz.question: ___ gentry
quiz.explanation: 绅士阶层, 绅士阶层. The gentry owned most of the land. 绅士阶层拥有大部分土地。

quiz.question: carpentry ______
quiz.explanation: 木工; 木工活, 木工技能. He learned carpentry skills from his father. 他从父亲那里学会了木工技能。

quiz.question: _________ zealotry
quiz.explanation: 狂热; 盲信, 宗教狂热. Religious zealotry can be dangerous. 宗教狂热可能很危险。

quiz.question: _____ pastry
quiz.explanation: 糕点; 面点, 水果糕点. She baked a delicious fruit pastry. 她烤了美味的水果糕点。

quiz.question: _____ ancestry
quiz.explanation: 祖先; 血统, 追溯祖先. DNA tests can trace ancestry. DNA测试可以追溯祖先。

quiz.question: ____ tapestry
quiz.explanation: 挂毯; 织锦, 丰富的织锦. The wall displayed a rich tapestry. 墙上展示着丰富的织锦。

quiz.question: ______ forestry
quiz.explanation: 林业, 森林林业. Forest forestry manages woodland resources. 森林林业管理林地资源。

quiz.question: ____ sophistry
quiz.explanation: 诡辩; 诡辩术, 纯粹的诡辩. His argument was mere sophistry. 他的论点纯粹是诡辩。

quiz.question: ________ artistry
quiz.explanation: 艺术技巧; 艺术性, 艺术技巧. The painting shows remarkable artistic artistry. 这幅画展示了非凡的艺术技巧。

quiz.question: fury __ _____
quiz.explanation: 狂怒; 狂暴, 风暴的狂怒. The fury of storm destroyed homes. 风暴的狂怒摧毁了房屋。

quiz.question: ____ augury
quiz.explanation: 预兆; 占卜, 好兆头. The clear skies were a good augury. 晴朗的天空是好兆头。

quiz.question: ______ perjury
quiz.explanation: 伪证罪, 犯伪证罪. It's illegal to commit perjury in court. 在法庭上犯伪证罪是非法的。

quiz.question: ____ __ penury
quiz.explanation: 贫困; 赤贫, 生活在贫困中. Many families live in penury. 许多家庭生活在贫困中。

quiz.question: ______ usury
quiz.explanation: 高利贷, 收取高利贷. It's illegal to charge usury rates. 收取高利贷利率是非法的。

quiz.question: _______ dowry
quiz.explanation: 嫁妆, 婚礼嫁妆. The bride brought a wedding dowry. 新娘带来了婚礼嫁妆。

quiz.question: ______ ____ fantasy
quiz.explanation: 幻想; 空想, 逃入幻想. She would escape into fantasy through books. 她会通过书籍逃入幻想。

quiz.question: _________ apostasy
quiz.explanation: 背教; 变节, 宗教背教. Religious apostasy was severely punished. 宗教背教受到严厉惩罚。

quiz.question: _________ heresy
quiz.explanation: 异端; 异教, 宗教异端. He was accused of religious heresy. 他被指控犯有宗教异端。

quiz.question: ________ whimsy
quiz.explanation: 奇想; 怪念头, 孩子气的奇想. The story is full of childish whimsy. 故事充满了孩子气的奇想。

quiz.question: rosy _______
quiz.explanation: 玫瑰色的; 乐观的, 乐观的前景. She maintains a rosy outlook on life. 她对生活保持乐观的前景。

quiz.question: brassy ____
quiz.explanation: 黄铜色的; 厚颜的, 刺耳的音调. The trumpet had a brassy tone. 小号有刺耳的音调。

quiz.question: prissy _______
quiz.explanation: 一本正经的; 拘谨的, 拘谨的举止. Her prissy manners annoyed everyone. 她拘谨的举止惹恼了所有人。

quiz.question: glossy ________
quiz.explanation: 有光泽的; 精美的, 精美杂志. She read a glossy magazine. 她读了一本精美杂志。

quiz.question: _____ treaty
quiz.explanation: 条约, 和平条约. Nations signed a peace treaty. 各国签署了和平条约。

quiz.question: _______ entreaty
quiz.explanation: 恳求; 哀求, 恳切的恳求. She made an earnest entreaty for help. 她恳切地恳求帮助。

quiz.question: crotchety ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 脾气暴躁的; 古怪的, 脾气暴躁的老人. The crotchety old man complained constantly. 脾气暴躁的老人不断抱怨。

quiz.question: _______ gaiety
quiz.explanation: 欢乐; 快活, 节日欢乐. The holiday gaiety filled the streets. 节日欢乐充满街道。

quiz.question: ________ sobriety
quiz.explanation: 清醒; 节制, 保持清醒. Drivers must maintain sobriety. 司机必须保持清醒。

quiz.question: _______ propriety
quiz.explanation: 得体; 礼节, 遵守礼节. Always observe propriety in formal settings. 在正式场合总要遵守礼节。

quiz.question: persnickety _______
quiz.explanation: 过分讲究的; 挑剔的, 挑剔的细节. She worried about persnickety details. 她担心挑剔的细节。

quiz.question: __ ___ entirety
quiz.explanation: 全部; 整体, 全部. Read the contract in its entirety. 完整地阅读合同。

quiz.question: crafty ____
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的; 诡计多端的, 狡猾的计划. They devised a crafty plan. 他们设计了一个狡猾的计划。

quiz.question: thrifty _______
quiz.explanation: 节俭的; 节约的, 节俭的购物者. The thrifty shopper looks for bargains. 节俭的购物者寻找便宜货。

quiz.question: lofty _____
quiz.explanation: 崇高的; 高尚的, 崇高的理想. He pursued a lofty ideal. 他追求崇高的理想。

quiz.question: mighty ______
quiz.explanation: 强大的; 巨大的, 强大的帝国. Rome was a mighty empire. 罗马是一个强大的帝国。

quiz.question: haughty ______
quiz.explanation: 傲慢的; 高傲的, 傲慢的一瞥. She gave him a haughty glance. 她傲慢地瞥了他一眼。

quiz.question: ___ laity
quiz.explanation: 俗人; 外行, 俗人. The laity attended the church service. 俗人参加了教堂礼拜。

quiz.question: ________ probity
quiz.explanation: 正直; 诚实, 个人正直. His personal probity was never questioned. 他的个人正直从未受到质疑。

quiz.question: ____ __ acerbity
quiz.explanation: 尖刻; 辛辣, 尖刻的语气. Her voice had a note of acerbity. 她的声音带有尖刻的语气。

quiz.question: _____ mendacity
quiz.explanation: 虚假; 谎言, 明显的虚假. His testimony was plain mendacity. 他的证词是明显的虚假。

quiz.question: __________ tenacity
quiz.explanation: 坚韧; 顽强, 非凡的坚韧. She showed remarkable tenacity. 她表现出非凡的坚韧。

quiz.question: ______ opacity
quiz.explanation: 不透明性, 屏幕不透明度. Adjust the screen opacity settings. 调整屏幕不透明度设置。

quiz.question: veracity __ ____
quiz.explanation: 真实性; 诚实, 数据的真实性. Question the veracity of data sources. 质疑数据来源的真实性。

quiz.question: _______ voracity
quiz.explanation: 贪食; 贪婪, 贪婪的贪食. He ate with wolfish voracity. 他贪婪地吃东西。

quiz.question: ______ infelicity
quiz.explanation: 不幸; 不当, 社交不当. His social infelicity caused embarrassment. 他的社交不当造成了尴尬。

quiz.question: _ multiplicity __
quiz.explanation: 多样性; 多重性, 多样性. There is a multiplicity of options. 有多种选择。

quiz.question: ________ complicity
quiz.explanation: 共谋; 串通, 犯罪共谋. He was charged with criminal complicity. 他被指控犯罪共谋。

quiz.question: _________ duplicity
quiz.explanation: 欺骗; 两面派, 政治欺骗. The scandal revealed political duplicity. 丑闻揭露了政治欺骗。

quiz.question: ______ authenticity
quiz.explanation: 真实性; 可靠性, 验证真实性. Experts verify authenticity of artwork. 专家验证艺术品的真实性。

quiz.question: _____ inelasticity
quiz.explanation: 无弹性, 价格无弹性. Price inelasticity means demand stays constant. 价格无弹性意味着需求保持不变。

quiz.question: ________ velocity
quiz.explanation: 速度, 终端速度. Objects reach terminal velocity in freefall. 物体在自由落体时达到终端速度。

quiz.question: ___ atrocity
quiz.explanation: 暴行; 残暴, 战争暴行. War atrocity shocked the world. 战争暴行震惊了世界。

quiz.question: _____ scarcity
quiz.explanation: 稀缺; 不足, 水资源稀缺. Water scarcity affects millions. 水资源稀缺影响数百万人。

quiz.question: _ paucity __ ____
quiz.explanation: 缺乏; 少量, 缺乏数据. There is a paucity of data on this topic. 关于这个话题缺乏数据。

quiz.question: _________ frigidity
quiz.explanation: 寒冷; 冷淡, 情感冷淡. His emotional frigidity hurt relationships. 他的情感冷淡伤害了关系。

quiz.question: timidity _______
quiz.explanation: 胆怯; 羞怯, 胆怯问题. Shyness is a timidity problem. 害羞是一个胆怯问题。

quiz.question: ____ fecundity
quiz.explanation: 多产; 肥沃, 土壤肥沃. Soil fecundity determines crop yields. 土壤肥沃决定作物产量。

quiz.question: ______ commodity
quiz.explanation: 商品, 全球商品. Oil is a valuable global commodity. 石油是有价值的全球商品。

quiz.question: ______ crudity
quiz.explanation: 粗鲁; 粗糙, 社交粗鲁. His social crudity offended guests. 他的社交粗鲁冒犯了客人。

quiz.question: _______ spontaneity
quiz.explanation: 自发性; 自然, 真诚的自发性. Her genuine spontaneity was refreshing. 她真诚的自发性令人耳目一新。

quiz.question: ________ homogeneity
quiz.explanation: 同质性; 均匀性, 文化同质性. Cultural homogeneity characterizes the region. 文化同质性是该地区的特点。

quiz.question: _____ superficiality
quiz.explanation: 肤浅; 浅薄, 纯粹的肤浅. The analysis showed sheer superficiality. 分析显示了纯粹的肤浅。

quiz.question: ________ partiality
quiz.explanation: 偏心; 偏袒, 司法偏袒. Judicial partiality undermines justice. 司法偏袒破坏了公正。

quiz.question: ____ conviviality
quiz.explanation: 欢乐; 欢宴, 温暖的欢乐. Warm conviviality filled the celebration. 温暖的欢乐充满了庆祝活动。

quiz.question: ____ formality
quiz.explanation: 正式; 仪式, 纯粹的形式. The interview was a mere formality. 面试纯粹是形式。

quiz.question: originality ______
quiz.explanation: 创意; 独创性, 独创性闪耀. His originality shines through the work. 他的独创性在作品中闪耀。

quiz.question: municipality ____
quiz.explanation: 市政当局, 市政当局规则. The municipality rule governs local affairs. 市政当局规则管理地方事务。

quiz.question: ________ liberality
quiz.explanation: 慷慨; 自由主义, 习惯性慷慨. His habitual liberality helped many. 他习惯性的慷慨帮助了许多人。

quiz.question: _____ generality
quiz.explanation: 概括; 泛论, 广泛的概括. Avoid broad generality in arguments. 在论证中避免广泛的概括。

quiz.question: _____ mortality
quiz.explanation: 死亡率; 必死性, 人类必死性. Philosophy explores human mortality. 哲学探讨人类必死性。

quiz.question: impermeability ____
quiz.explanation: 不渗透性, 不渗透性测试. The impermeability test checks waterproofing. 不渗透性测试检查防水性。

quiz.question: _____ liability
quiz.explanation: 责任; 债务, 法律责任. The company faces legal liability. 公司面临法律责任。

quiz.question: ________ viability
quiz.explanation: 生存能力; 可行性, 商业可行性. Assess business viability before investing. 投资前评估商业可行性。

quiz.question: indispensability __ _____
quiz.explanation: 不可缺少, 水的不可缺少. The indispensability of water is obvious. 水的不可缺少是显而易见的。

quiz.question: ____ tractability
quiz.explanation: 易处理性; 温顺, 高度易处理性. The material has high tractability. 该材料具有高度易处理性。

quiz.question: _________ excitability
quiz.explanation: 易激动性, 情绪易激动性. His emotional excitability caused problems. 他的情绪易激动性造成了问题。

quiz.question: ______ accountability
quiz.explanation: 责任; 问责制, 公共问责制. Public accountability is essential in government. 公共问责制在政府中至关重要。

quiz.question: ______ notability
quiz.explanation: 显著; 著名, 公众知名度. His public notability grew quickly. 他的公众知名度迅速增长。

quiz.question: ________ debility
quiz.explanation: 虚弱; 衰弱, 身体虚弱. Age brought physical debility. 年龄带来了身体虚弱。

quiz.question: incorrigibility ______
quiz.explanation: 不可救药, 不可救药的记录. His incorrigibility record was extensive. 他不可救药的记录很广泛。

quiz.question: ___ intangibility __ ______
quiz.explanation: 无形性, 权利的无形性. The intangibility of rights makes enforcement difficult. 权利的无形性使执行变得困难。
